name: EVALUMATIC
description:
[STORY]

In a bleak and harsh future everyone is left to fend for themselves. Sexism, harsh language and alternative facts are running rampant and society is balancing on the edge of chaos. In an effort to stabilize the society every citizen must pass a bi-monthly government mandated attitude test. Prove your worth to the government psychologist and earn the right to live for another two months...

[INSTRUCTIONS]

Use your computer keyboard to respond to the government psychologist. Use backspace to delete and change written words, use the return button to confirm your compete sentences.
